author: Shirley Spear
method: Whisk the cream together with the honey and whisky.  Fold in the toasted oatmeal.  Pile on top of fresh raspberries and serve.
ingredients: 250ml/Â½ pint fresh double cream,  1 tbsp thick heather honey.,  1 generous tbsp of Talisker whisky,  1 heaped tbsp of toasted oatmeal,  2 punnets rasberries
